nodes.text: The senatorial conference building was a building located in the senatorial complex of the New Republic's capital world of Hosnian Prime. The structure contained multiple rooms appropriate for any auxiliary function imaginable, including memorial concerts, awards ceremonies and banquets.

In 28 ABY, the conference building was bombed by the paramilitary known as the Amaxine warriors. However, thanks to a napkin-written message left for Princess Leia Organa during a breakfast meeting, the senator was able to activate the building's alarm and evacuate the building before the explosion. Due to her efforts, no-one was killed, although a few hundred people were injured.
